search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Wistia (wistia.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Wistia is located at: [https://wistia.com/pricing](https://wistia.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Explore Free, Plus, Pro, and Advanced Pricing Plans | Wistia

extracted_content.content:
Wistia Pricing
--------------

Find your perfect video fit

Explore the video basics

$0/mo

Seriously free

1 user

Comes with 10 media

Start with the video essentials

*   Video recording and editing

Plus
----

Unlock custom video branding

$19/mo

3 users

Comes with 20 media

Everything in Free +

*   Clickable video CTAs
*   Team commenting and review

[View all features](https://wistia.com/pricing?sitelink=plans_for_every_budget&device=c&gad=1#features-table)

Recommended

Advanced

Optimize your video marketing

20 users

Everything in Pro +

*   Automate campaigns with video

*   Account success manager

[View all features](https://wistia.com/pricing?sitelink=plans_for_every_budget&device=c&gad=1#features-table)

Premium
-------

Secure & scale video across teams

Custom

Unlimited users

Everything in Advanced +

*   Dedicated accounts for teams

Live chat & priority support

| 

Customer Success manager



 | — | — | — |  |  |

*   #### Is the Free Plan really free?
    
    Yes! It’s not a trial and it’s free forever. Wistia’s Free Plan comes with 10 videos, 200 GB of bandwidth per month, basic analytics, and the ability to customize the player to match the look and feel of your brand.
    
*   #### What’s the difference between included media and the total media limit?
    
    Included media is a little bit, well…literal! It’s the number of video or audio files you can upload to Wistia at no extra charge (i.e., what’s included on your plan). Once you’ve hit your included media limit, you can still upload audio or video files to Wistia—for a small additional cost. The total media limit? This one refers to the maximum number of video or audio files you can upload to Wistia on any plan.
    
*   #### What counts as a “media file”?
    
    Any file you upload counts as a media file. We suggest sticking to video and audio.
    
*   #### I want to add more team members to Wistia. Can I purchase additional users?
    
    The best way to unlock additional users is by upgrading your Wistia plan. We’ve carefully designed our plans to align with various phases of your video journey. If you need to add more collaborators to your Wistia account, there’s a good chance you’ll benefit from what’s available on the next tier up—things like higher media limits and more sophisticated reporting. It’s also important to note that you can share view-only links to your audio and video content with anyone.
    
*   #### Will I be charged for bandwidth?
    
    We don’t want you to have to worry about bandwidth. That’s why each plan has a clear bandwidth limit. Our Free Plan includes 200 GB per month, which should be more than enough for 10 uploads. If you’re on a Plus, Pro, or Advanced Plan, you’ll have a bandwidth limit of 1 TB per month. And finally, if you’re on our Premium Plan, you’ll have custom bandwidth coverage. If you ever exceed your bandwidth limit, we’ll notify you and offer you the option to upgrade your plan to one with a higher bandwidth limit. For more information, [check out our support doc on bandwidth](https://wistia.com/support/account-and-billing/bandwidth "Link opens in a new tab") or [get in touch with us](https://wistia.com/pricing/getintouch "Link opens in a new tab").
    
*   #### Do you have any file size restrictions?
    
    Wistia plays best with **MP4 files** with an **h.264 codec**, a bitrate between **5,000–10,000 kbps**, and a maximum file size of **26 GB**. If your file doesn’t fit within these guidelines, try running the file through [HandBrake](https://handbrake.fr/ "Link opens in a new tab") (a free transcoding software) to see if that resolves the problem.
    
*   #### Can I purchase features a-la-carte?
    
    We hate to be a bummer, but you can’t purchase features a-la-carte. We’ve carefully designed our plans to align with different phases of your video journey. If you want a specific feature, there’s a good chance you’ll benefit from what’s on the next tier up—like higher media limits, more collaborators, and more sophisticated reporting.
    
*   #### Can I cancel at any time?
    
    Yes, you can cancel at any time unless you have a signed contract or order form with us. If you elect to cancel a paid plan during your billing cycle, you will not be issued a refund.
    

Ready to take Wistia for a spin?
--------------------------------

Start for free. Compare Wistia features and pick the plan that supports your video marketing goals.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Wistia offers a free tier with limited features and media, and paid tiers with increasing capabilities and limits. Premium tier pricing is custom and requires contacting the team.

Pick the plan that’s right for you

No credit card required.

Billed yearly save 20%

|

Billed monthly

Free
----

$0/mo

Seriously, free forever

[Sign up for free](https://wistia.com/account/signup?plan_type=free "Sign up for free")

*   ✓ Up to 10 videos
*   ✓ Customizable player
*   ✓ Recording and editing

Plus
----

$19/mo

Billed at $230 per year

[Start a free trial](https://app.wistia.com/auth/wistia_auth_register_pre_auth?plan_type=plus_trial "Start a free trial")

*   Everything in Free, and...
*   ✓ Remove Wistia Branding
*   ✓ Basic CTAs
*   ✓ Multiple users

Pro
---

$79/mo

Billed at $950 per year

[Start a free trial](https://app.wistia.com/auth/wistia_auth_register_pre_auth?plan_type=pro_trial "Start a free trial")

*   Everything in Plus, and...
*   ✓ Lead capture forms
*   ✓ Enhanced data analytics
*   ✓ Webinar hosting

Advanced
--------

$319/mo

Billed at $3,830 per year

[Start a free trial](https://app.wistia.com/auth/wistia_auth_register_pre_auth?plan_type=advanced_trial "Start a free trial")

*   ✓ Marketing integrations
*   ✓ Unlimited video galleries
